title: What is Your "Custom Status Message"?
body:
As the title says, let's see who has good jokes.

Mine is "Creating Norman Game"

replies.body:
"Riot is stupid"

Bring back sightstone (i hate getting sightstone at 14 minutes if i'm losing, which happened yesterday).
"I hate inters..." or "Eve to Masters"... It varies.

mine varies, but is usually either 'nbn is a lie' because it is, or 'bronze 5' for when I'm feeling frustrated by how rusty I am after having not played for a while due to either assignments, exams, or other life issues.
